flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: We've written a detailed directions booklet on how to get going with your own Create-A-Table project, make a Baby Sister or Lil' Bubba table, charming decorative tables for any room, special table toppers for holidays and even outdoors.
guide.introduction_rendered: We've written a detailed directions booklet on how to get going with your own Create-A-Table project, make a Baby Sister or Lil' Bubba table, charming decorative tables for any room, special table toppers for holidays and even outdoors.

lines.text: Tables toppers are painted with washable acrylic paints. They can be a permanent part of the tables, or removable.
lines.text_raw: Tables toppers are painted with washable acrylic paints. They can be a permanent part of the tables, or removable.

guide.summary: You can turn an any small old table into an art work, make a charming child's table, or even a famous artist masterpiece for your living room. It's an anything goes you've never seen anything like it before craft project. Fun and easy!
guide.title: Create-A-Table Art  Project
